resources.string: No legislators found for your zipcode.
No legislators found for your location.
No legislators found by that last name.
Connection failed. Press refresh to try again.
This app made by Sunlight Labs, a division of the Sunlight Foundation that is dedicated to increasing government transparency through the power of technology.
News powered by the Yahoo! News API.\nTwitter search powered by JTwitter.\nLegislator search and information powered by the Sunlight Labs API.
A few things you can do:
Tap "My Location" to find your district's representatives. Tap the call button to give them a call.
If a legislator tweets, read them on the Twitter tab, and tap one to reply.
Long press on your desktop to add a shortcut to a legislator\'s profile.
Summary by the Congressional Research Service.
